params.text: Eddubu lyagala nnyo langi.
Eddubu lisanga langi.

params.alt: The bear wants to find more colours.
params.title: The bear wants to find more colours.

params.text: Amatu aga kyenvu .
Olubuto lwa kitaka.

params.alt: The bear has a brown tummy.
params.title: The bear has a brown tummy.

params.text: Emikono gya bbululu.

params.alt: The bear has a green back.
params.title: The bear has a green back.

params.text: Amagulu ga pinki.
Eddubu erya langi ez’enjawulo.

params.alt: Oops, the bear has no more colours.
params.title: Oops, the bear has no more colours.

params.text: Tewakyali langi.

"Langi" story credits

This work, "Langi", is a derivative of "Colours" as translated by Alisha Berger and used under CC BY. The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2015. "Langi" is based on the original story: रंग, by Priyanka. © Room to Read, 2015.

This work, "Langi" is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.       

Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza

This story 'Rang' has been published on StoryWeaver by Room to Read.
